net.co.java.entity

Class Entity.View

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.co.java.entity.Entity.View
  • Enclosing class:
    Entity

    public class Entity.View
extends java.lang.Object
    The View class is a collection that contains all Entities within the view range of this Entity
    Author:
    Jan-Willem Gmelig Meyling, Thomas Gmelig Meyling

      Constructors

      Entity.View()

      void add(Entity e)
      Add an Entity to this Entities view.

      Check if the View contains a specific Entity
      Entity[] entities(boolean includingMe) 
      Player[] players(boolean includingMe) 
      void remove(Entity e)
      Remove an Entity from this Entities view.
      int size() 
      void update()
      Update an entities view, remove entities that were in the previous view, but not in the current, and spawn entities that only appear in the current view.

      • contains

        public boolean contains(Entity e)
        Check if the View contains a specific Entity
        Parameters:
        e -
        Returns:
        true if the Entity is in View

      • size

        public int size()
        Returns:
        the amount of Entities in this View

      • add

        public void add(Entity e)
        Add an Entity to this Entities view. If the Entity is not in the current view of the other entity, send spawn packets to each other.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • remove

        public void remove(Entity e)
        Remove an Entity from this Entities view. If the Entity is not in the current view of the other entity, send entity remove packets to each other.
        Parameters:
        e -

      • update

        public void update()
        Update an entities view, remove entities that were in the previous view, but not in the current, and spawn entities that only appear in the current view.

      • entities

        public Entity[] entities(boolean includingMe)
        Parameters:
        includingMe -
        Returns:
        An array containing all entities in this view

      • players

        public Player[] players(boolean includingMe)
        Parameters:
        includingMe -
        Returns:
        an array containing all players in this view
